channel.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
channel.description: Okay, Guys, How Do I Change The IP On My Source And Client? (PI Source) (Tragedy Pking Base)

item.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]To get your static IP you can look at any of your posts on Mopar, and down in the bottom right, it says “Report to moderator” - beside that says your IP, or “Logged” if it’s someone else’s post.

Dynanic IPs are basically your IP, just renamed. To get a Dynamic IP, you need a Dynamic Client. (Popular ones are DynDNS and NO-IP.)

No, it’s not impossible. Something is just stopping it.[/quote]Well, I Want To Use My Same IP So I Will Just Use Its static IP
And Yes, I Think My ISP Is Blocking It But We Can’t Get A New One… How Do I Unblock It?

ALSO Can I Make 2 Worlds On My Server?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I don’t have TeamViewer anymore, but it’s not impossible to port-forward your computer. As for the connection String ( server = “connection String”; ) if you buy a VPS, you will get the VPS ip. If you use a dynamic DNS client (DynDNS, NO-IP, etc), it will be a dynamic IP, if you use your IP, it will be static. (http://www.whatsmyip.org/)[/quote]Okay, I Don’t Know What A dynamic DNS client, (DynDNS), static ip Are At All Lol. (ohh Wait, I Think I Got It, Like Dynamic IP Is Like, No-Ip.com And Static Ip Is Like My IP Address In My Computer?)

And Also It Is Impossible To Port-forward My Computer.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”](server = “VPS_IP”;)[/quote]The Real IP Like, start>run>cmd>ipconfig>(IP)
Like That IP Or A No-ip IP? And I Have To Use A VPS Because My Computer Is Fucked Up, Can’t Open My Fucking Port, Had About 16 or 17 People Try… Everyone Failed… I Asked You Before Because Your A “Server Helper” And You Just Stood Out Lol, If You Could Help Me Over TeamViewer To Try To Fix This That Would Be Beast!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]YOUR client connects to localhost (if you are running the server), if you make the server public, you will want a separate copy of the client for OTHERs to connect via your static IP, or a dynamic IP.[/quote]Okay, So Lets Say I Am Going To Buy A VPS And I Just Give Them My Source And I Run My Source On There, Then My Client On My Computer Will Connect To It, And I Upload My Client So Others Can Use Can They Connect?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help Please! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]You don’t edit any IP in the source.

In the client, in should be in client class. (client.java)

Look for server = "[/quote]Well, If I Don’t Edit Anything In The Source, How Will It Connect To The Right Source?

Read full topic
